doc:
Curt Lowens https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Curt_Lowens 0 Curt Lowens (17 November 1925 – 8 May 2017) was an actor of the stage and in feature films and television, as well as a Holocaust survivor and a rescuer who saved about 150 Jewish children during the Holocaust. Curt_Lowens ( 17_November_1925 – 8_May_2017 ) was an_actor of the_stage and in feature_films_and_television , as_well_as a_Holocaust_survivor and a_rescuer who saved about_150_Jewish_children during the_Holocaust .
